name: 1984 Tanzania 2m Temperature Yearly Average (Copernicus)
description: A raster dataset with yearly averages of the 2m temperature from the ERA 5 renanalysis data from Copernicus satellite sensors for Tanzania. ERA5 is the fifth generation ECMWF reanalysis for the global climate and weather for the past 8 decades. Data is available from 1940 onwards. ERA5 replaces the ERA-Interim reanalysis.
